author: tvolkert
msg: PIVOT-96 :: Changed to repaint immediately when focus is *lost*, not gained.  This yields better performance when the cause of the focus gain is a mouse down, in which case a deferred repaint is most often triggered anyway.

author: tvolkert
msg: PIVOT-96 :: skins that repaint upon focus changed pass the immediate flag when they gain the focus, deferred when they lose the focus.  This means that the repaint region for the deferred paint is only as big as the component that lost focus, as opposed to the entire area in between the two components
